config.FallColor.name: Fall Color
config.FallColor.description: changes the orange fall to green
config.RecolorMode.name: Recolor Mode
config.RecolorMode.Description: changes the saturation, vibrant is more compatible with other mods, rustic is darker than both
config.DarkerPaths.name: Darker Paths
config.DarkerPaths.Description: changes the white town path color to be darker
config.StaticFoliage.name: Static Foliage
config.StaticFoliage.Description: replaces vanilla static trees and bushes
config.TreesandBushes.name: Trees and Bushes
config.Grass.name: Grass
config.Desert.name: Desert
config.Desert.Description: replaces the desert terrain and foliage
config.Beach.name: Beach
config.BeanstalkWildTree/FlowerTree.name: BeanstalkWildTree/FlowerTree
config.BeanstalkWildTree/FlowerTree.Desc: replaces the wildtree with beanstalk or flower tree
config.DancingFlowers/Mushrooms.name: Dancing Flowers and Mushrooms
config.DancingFlowers/Mushrooms.Descript: replaces some tilesheet animations with mushroom and flower
